filter.description: A MongoDB query expression to filter the data. All rows matched by the filter will be deleted

errorMessage.type: GoogleSheetDeleteMany request property "filter" should be an object.

limit.description: The maximum number of rows to fetch.

errorMessage.type: GoogleSheetDeleteMany request property "options.limit" should be a number.

skip.description: The number of rows to skip from the top of the sheet.

errorMessage.type: GoogleSheetDeleteMany request property "options.skip" should be a number.
GoogleSheetDeleteMany request properties should be an object.

required.filter: GoogleSheetDeleteMany request should have required property "filter".
